response:
Hi Nigel, I'm trying to schedule a 30 minute meeting for us next week (the week of March 25-29, 2024). Here is my current schedule for next week:
  Monday March 25: 
  9:00-17:00 Research work at the lab
  
  Tuesday March 26:
  10:00-12:00 Meeting with research team
  14:00-16:00 Prepare presentation for conference 
  
  Wednesday March 27:
  9:00-17:00 Attend conference and present research
  
  Thursday March 28:  
  10:00-12:00 Collaborate with colleagues on research project
  19:00-21:00 Dinner with visiting researchers
  
  Friday March 29:
  9:00-17:00 Analyze research data and write report
  
  Could you let me know your availability for a 30 minute meeting on any of those days? I'm fairly flexible outside of the specific commitments listed.
  
  Looking forward to meeting,
  Jun
